title: Add DropDownList to Pop up menu of A grid(Kendo)
body:
I have a Kendo Grid,i need to add a DropDownList To my grid the code is :

$("#grid").kendoGrid({

  dataSource: dataSource,
  pageable: true,
  height: 550,
  toolbar: ["create"],
  columns: [
   { field:"ProductName", title: "Product Name" },

   { command: ["edit"], title: " ", width: "250px" }],
                    editable: "popup"
                });
            });
